Title: Знайти Бригадира
Description:
Dagran was right. I suppose I shouldn't be surprised by that any longer.

All the signs suggest there's something in this cave. Maybe the foreman is hiding here. Maybe she can give us some answers.

We've come this far. Let's see what's inside.
CompletionText: There must be answers deeper within the cave.
RewardText: That was her. The foreman. It had to be. After all that... she was already gone.
